CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 29, 1950, pg. 11 reads: "Awarded Scholarships - Mrs. Murella Spraggins, left, president of the Junior Metoka Club, is pictured awarding scholarships amounting to almost $700 to Melvin Campbell, Pauline Hall, Ernestine Summers, Marion Coleman, Shirley Page and Marjorie Hosbey. The presentation was made at the annual Scholarship Garden Party, given by the Senior Metoka Club last Thursday. - Teenie Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Murella Spraggins of the Metoka Club, presenting scholarships to winners, from left: Melvin Campbell, Pauline Hall, Ernestine Summers, Marion Coleman, Shirley Page, and Marjorie Hosbey, standing on lawn during annual Scholarship Garden Party
